flavor: The hue of your soul, the voice of your spirit, the shape of your flesh are yours to decide. Be free.
stripped_text: 0 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only once per turn.
text: 0[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Quetzal: Free Spirit

flavor: I'm through with games.
stripped_text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1 credit more to rez.
text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1[credit] more to rez.
title: Reina Roja: Freedom Fighter

flavor:
"If you're not in position to press the advantage, you'll never gain the upper hand."
—The Playbook
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run this turn. Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.
text:
Play only if you made a successful run this turn.
Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.
title: En Passant

flavor: Someone's trash is another's treasure.
stripped_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
title: Retrieval Run

flavor: Surprising, how a single blocked datafeed brings the system to its knees.
stripped_text: The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
text:
The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda.
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
title: Clot

stripped_text: Interface > 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text: Interface > 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Corroder

flavor: Just don't let it bounce back up the feed to your rig.

text:
When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it.
Access > Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Imp

flavor: What is another mask to those we already wear?
stripped_text: Interface > 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
text: Interface > 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
title: Mimic

flavor: At the code level, all ice manifests via a small number of common protocols. Security managers are kept awake by nightmares of a disgruntled sysop walking out the door with the core infosec library.
stripped_text: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets -1 strength.
text: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets -1 strength.
title: Ice Carver

flavor: Money is like gravity, it accretes. Justice is like resisting gravity, it takes force.
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 16 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 4 credits from this resource.
text:
When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
[click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
title: Liberated Account

flavor: Destruction is forever.
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
title: Scrubber

flavor:
Nobles born foolish cared not for their state
I was left alone weeping
—Toghon Temur
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1 credit.
text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
title: Xanadu

flavor: Live in the fast lane.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1 credit.
text: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1[credit].
title: Ken "Express" Tenma: Disappeared Clone

flavor: Yeah. I'm thinking I'm back.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.
text: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.
title: Steve Cambridge: Master Grifter

flavor: "I see great opportunities ahead for you."
stripped_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3 credits less.
text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3[credit] less.
title: Career Fair

flavor:
"Did you order the defrag?"
"...I thought you did?"
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
title: Emergency Shutdown

flavor:
"Electronic warfare, like all warfare, is based on deception."
—The Playbook
stripped_text: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
text: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
title: Forged Activation Orders

flavor: "I'm not an actor, but I am a professional." —Gabriel Santiago
stripped_text: Run any server. The first time this run you encounter a piece of ice, bypass it.
text: Run any server. The first time this run you encounter a piece of ice, bypass it.
title: Inside Job

flavor: Go outside. Work with your hands. It'll do you good.
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
text: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
title: Legwork

flavor: It's not what you know. It's who you know.
stripped_text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1 credit to add this event to your grip.
text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1[credit] to add this event to your grip.
title: Networking

flavor: Slippier than a buttered escargot.
stripped_text: Interface > 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. trash: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
text: Interface > 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
title: Abagnale

flavor: Her touch is as cold as her heart.
stripped_text: Interface > 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1 credit for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
text: Interface > 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
title: Femme Fatale

flavor: There is no such thing as truly disconnected from the Net.
stripped_text: click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
text: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
title: Sneakdoor Beta

flavor: They pay you for the practice run, then you do it again for the real reward.

text:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time this turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2[credit].
title: Security Testing

stripped_text: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. click: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.
text: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. [click]: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.
title: Ayla "Bios" Rahim: Simulant Specialist

flavor: My thoughts open; unbound within, unblocked without.

text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
title: Rielle "Kit" Peddler: Transhuman

flavor: No Diesel? No fire!
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards.
text: Draw 3 cards.
title: Diesel

flavor: No code survives contact with the user.
stripped_text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack if you searched it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack if you searched it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
title: Test Run

flavor: The incoming datafeed is blunted, rendered into a soft lie our brains can understand. Seeing the Reality beyond takes dedication and practice.
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
text: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
title: The Maker's Eye

flavor: I do not run with my tools. I run with my heart.

flavor: I saved it to my desktop once; couldn't find the thing for a week!

text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface > 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.

flavor:
"Pallas Athena sent a heron gliding down the night. They could not see it passing, but they heard its cry."
—The Iliad

text: Install only on a rezzed piece of ice. Host ice gains barrier, code gate, and sentry.

flavor: A thousand puzzles with a single solution.

text: Interface > 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

flavor: A rising tide drowns all servers.

text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.
title: Paricia

flavor: If you have something to sell, Aesop is interested in buying. The only detail he won't ask is where you got it.

text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].

flavor: You can hack a social network, but hard work, collaboration, and a sympathetic ear gets you there faster.
stripped_text: click: Gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.
text: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
title: Professional Contacts

flavor: I thought I'd feel bad about this. I don't.

text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5[credit].
title: Dirty Laundry

flavor: They were off the market for years, till the Beanstalk Crisis made redundancy fashionable again.

text: 1[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.

When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it.

flavor: Perfection of form.

text:

Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
title: Project Vitruvius

flavor: They only get one childhood. Make it count.

text: When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset. [interrupt] > When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)

flavor: Hello again! Back for another game?

text:

flavor: I roar with a thousand voices, wield a thousand weapons, remember a thousand lives.

[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.

flavor: It's not sleep. Sleep is dreams, activity, change. These are still, cold, dead.

text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
title: Archived Memories

flavor: Sometimes we at Haas-Bioroid are asked how well bioroids interface socially with human workforces. Thanks to our tireless efforts, we believe this will not be a problem in the long term.
stripped_text: Gain click click.
text: Gain [click][click].

flavor: Problem solved.

text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.

flavor: The payment for entry is a mere drop of blood.

When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it.

text:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it.

text:
The strength of this ice cannot be lowered.

title: Lotus Field

flavor: The pain of its first cutting art is a test. Bleed human-red and the second attack is stilled.

text: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed AI program. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
title: Swordsman

flavor: We knew we'd found this season's must-have when all twenty of the A-tier influencers refused to return the teacup alpacas.

As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].

title: Celebrity Gift

flavor: Are you watching closely?

text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
title: Trick of Light

flavor: Director Kase hung landscapes of the Hokusai facility behind their desk. The implication was wonderful for concentrating the minds of the staff.

text: When you score this agenda, you may reveal 1 asset or upgrade in HQ or Archives. Install and rez that card, ignoring all costs.

Space bent back. Folds on folds.
Endlessly wide. Paper deep.

text:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
title: Subliminal Messaging
